channel.title: Sagemaker on bad to the code
channel.description: Recent content in Sagemaker on bad to the code

item.title: happy faces in a bucket
item.description: Remember we downloaded the pictures of our parliamentarians and made a patchwork with them? I looked for a while how to analyse for gender, age and skin color. One obvious candidate was Rekognition for AWS if only because the instances that are at my workplace decided to use AWS services. Getting a little bit more familiar with using AWS services seemed like a good choice. I searched for R packages to use Rekognition with, but did not find any.
